TopicTitle: Who says Kerbal Space Program can't be multiplayer?

Articles.Content: So my brothers and I had an idea to liven up KSP by taking a challenge, adding a time limit, and doing it simultaneously. The results are pretty hilarious, and worth repeating!
You and your brothers seem to have potential. Keep on doing things that are "bad enough."
Thanks! Will do. Next episode will be ready tomorrow or the next day!
